chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (x k km1 : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), length e <= km1 -> km1 <= k - 1 -> x < k -> length (raw_insert x o e) <= k

Premises:
raw_insert : forall A : Type, nat -> option A -> env A -> env A
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
length_insert_general : forall (A : Type) (x k : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), length e = k -> length (raw_insert x o e) = mymax (1 + k) (1 + x)
defined_implies_below_length : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (x k : nat) (a : A), length e <= k -> lookup x e = Some a -> x < k
insert_insert : forall (A : Type) (k s : nat) (a b : option A) (e : env A), k <= s -> raw_insert k a (raw_insert s b e) = raw_insert (1 + s) b (raw_insert k a e)
lookup_insert_recent : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x < y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
insert_insert_always : forall (A : Type) (k s : nat) (a b : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert k a (raw_insert s b e) = raw_insert (shift k s) b (raw_insert (if le_gt_dec k s then k else k - 1) a e)
lookup_insert_old : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x > y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup (x - 1) e
subst_idx_miss_2 : forall v k x : nat, k < x -> subst_idx v k x = var (x - 1)
lookup_insert_bingo : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x = y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = o
lift_idx_old : forall w k x : nat, k <= x -> lift w k x = w + x
lookup_shift_insert : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), lookup (shift y x) (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
lift_idx_recent : forall w k x : nat, k > x -> lift w k x = x
lookup_beyond_length : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (x : nat), length e <= x -> lookup x e = None
raw_insert_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert (S x) o e = lookup 0 e :: raw_insert x o (tl e)
empty_eq_insert : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : A) (e : env A), empty A = insert x o e -> False
rotate_characterization : forall n k : nat, (k = 0 -> rotate n k = n) /\ (k > 0 -> k <= n -> rotate n k = k - 1) /\ (k > n -> rotate n k = k)
fold_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : option A -> B -> B) (o : option A) (e : env A) (accu : B), fold f (raw_insert 0 o e) accu = f o (fold f e accu)
length_empty : forall (A : Type) (k : nat), length (empty A) <= k
fold_invariant : forall (A B : Type) (P : env A -> B -> Prop) (f : option A -> B -> B) (accu : B), P (empty A) accu -> (forall (o : option A) (e : env A) (accu0 : B), P e accu0 -> P (raw_insert 0 o e) (f o accu0)) -> forall e : env A, P e (fold f e accu)
length_monotonic : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k1 k2 : nat), length e <= k1 -> k1 <= k2 -> length e <= k2
lift_lift : forall t k s wk ws : nat, k <= s -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws (wk + s) (lift wk k t)
raw_insert_zero : forall (A : Type) (o : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert 0 o e = o :: e
map_raw_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (e : env A), map f (raw_insert x None e) = raw_insert x None (map f e)
lookup_map_none : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = None -> lookup x (map f e) = None
map_lift_map_lift : forall (T : Type) (k s wk ws : nat) (e : env T) (H : Lift T), LiftLift -> k <= s -> map (lift wk k) (map (lift ws s) e) = map (lift ws (wk + s)) (map (lift wk k) e)
translate_lift : forall w x y z : nat, lift w x y = z -> forall k : nat, lift w (k + x) (k + y) = k + z
insert_nil : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), insert x a e = nil -> False
lookup_map_some : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = Some a -> lookup x (map f e) = Some (f a)
map_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), map f (insert x a e) = insert x (f a) (map f e)
map_insert_eq : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (b : B) (e : env A), f a = b -> map f (insert x a e) = insert x b (map f e)
lookup_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A), lookup (S x) e = lookup x (tl e)
